overview: Just imagine: Devyn, Tanner, Tim, and Mike teach the hapless pledges house rules. With the pledges, Chad, Chris, Grant & Scott soon finding out there's nothing they won't do... like it or not. Every frat house has a class sucker, and in this case, it's Grant Larsen. And every house has a big orgy, where brother meets brother in the most ultimate of bonding rituals. Well, maybe not every house. Are you ready for The Initiation?
title: The Initiation
